attributes.title: This app caused my Grandfather’s death
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app as a fellow Trump supporter. I mainly get my news on from President Trump’s twitter, but my Grandfather doesn’t have twitter so I tried to download this to show him how to use it so he could stay informed. Because this app took so long to download, he fell asleep in his chair. I think it took maybe three or four hours? When it finally downloaded, the phone started buzzing kind of like an amber alert notification and was immediately unusable. A message came on the screen saying my personal information had been shared to “the cloud,” which I don’t even know what that means because I don’t have an iphone. All of this loud noise and scary messages caused my just woken up grandpa to have a heart attack, and die. There was nothing anyone could do to help him, that’s how big it was. So thanks Trump, while I have supported you wholeheartedly in the past, I don’t think I can continue to do so when I know that the bugs or whatever is going on with YOUR app killed my beloved grandfather...may he rest in peace 💗

attributes.title: So disappointed😖
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for the pure reason of getting to find out more about our glorious Trump. But it turns out his tan is fake and his hair is from corn husks😭 Fake news everywhere I go...even from Trump-kun🥺😭

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I was mislead!!!! I was scrolling on the App Store & thought this said trumpet 😤😤😤 then when I downloaded it I saw this orange guy that wanted to force me to vote for him 😡😡😡 I was looking for pleasant music but was shown a loud cry baby voice, never had I ever heard such a annoying president 🤬🤬🤬this app needs help and this nasty Trump man needs to go back in his crib 🙄🙄🙄🙄
